translations: 谄媚者，奉承者（toady 的复数）
谄媚，奉承（toady 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: He toadies to his aunt, hoping to gain some of her money.
sentences.translation: 他花言巧语地哄着他姑姑，想从她那儿弄些钱。

sentences.sentence: I despise toadies who suck up to their bosses; they are generally the same people who bully their subordinates.
sentences.translation: 我鄙视对上司谄媚奉承的马屁精；这种人通常也擅于欺凌威协他们的下属。
